# runt

> runt is a modular, multi-language runtime and agent framework for AI, automation, and notebook environments. It provides unified interfaces for working with LLMs, agents, and tools across Python, Deno, and browser runtimes.

runt supports flexible integration with popular LLM providers, local models, and custom agents. It is designed for extensibility, stability, and ease of use in research, development, and production settings.

## Documentation

- [README](https://github.com/runtimed/runt/blob/main/README.md): Project overview, installation, and usage instructions
- [AGENTS.md](https://github.com/runtimed/runt/blob/main/AGENTS.md): Details on agent architecture and usage
- [AI_TOOLS.md](https://github.com/runtimed/runt/blob/main/packages/ai/AI_TOOLS.md): Information on AI tools and integrations

## Examples

- [test-auth.ts](https://github.com/runtimed/runt/blob/main/test-auth.ts): Example authentication test
- [test-directory-creation-order.py](https://github.com/runtimed/runt/blob/main/test-directory-creation-order.py): Directory creation order test

- [LICENSE](https://github.com/runt/LICENSE): License information
